page.title: 19PUB LIFE IN NESSCLIFFE CONT
page.content: There is a lot of gambling - fruit machines, dominoes, horse betting, pool, darts and arguments. We have just enough money to live on and are not particularly well off. We have competition from The Three Pigeons, another pub just down the road. Mum overworks and only has 1hrs sleep in the afternoon when she is not gardening and about 5 at night. She runs the bar and kitchen, helping Dad and doing meals. Dad normally sits in the bar arguing, serving, betting, drinking and sorting out the occasional fight. Peak times are 8 -9 at night and midday. We sometimes have coachloads for a meal. The most difficult thing is to get everyone out by lO.3O at night and a few are normally still there by 1am. We rarely get into trouble with the police though.
